snippet: The attack in the southern city of Guilin on Monday was certain to raise further questions among parents about security at schools.
abstract: Homemade bomb outside a school in the southern Chinese city of Guilin kills at least two people and injures 17, many of them children; explosion is certain to raise further questions among parents about security at schools in China.
lead_paragraph: The attack in the southern city of Guilin on Monday was certain to raise further questions among parents about security at schools.

headline.main: Bomb Kills 2 Outside School in China
